thread.title: Grover Gaming Accepted as Associate Member of NASPL
thread.title_full: Grover Gaming Accepted as Associate Member of NASPL

author: admin
title: Grover Gaming Accepted as Associate Member of NASPL
text:
Grover Gaming Inc. 
GREENVILLE, N.C., Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Grover Gaming Inc. (Grover) announced today that it has been accepted as an Associate Member of the North American Association of State and Provincial Lotteries (NASPL). 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150909/265089LOGO 
"Joining NASPL was really an easy decision for Grover Gaming," said Warren Allen, Marketing Director at Grover. "Grover has been quietly developing products that have relevance in the lottery world and we think that joining NASPL is an absolute must." 
NASPL has been around for over forty years and now represents over fifty lottery organizations on the North American continent. 
"I think NASPL is a good match for us," stated Garrett Blackwelder, President of Grover, "Grover is really involved in charitable gaming and one of the central tenets of NASPL is furthering the public confidence in, and support for, the agencies and entities that generate revenue to meet public needs." 
Blackwelder continued: "This will be our first year exhibiting at NASPL's Annual Conference and we are excited about being a part of that show and the industry as a whole!" Grover will be demonstrating its charitable pull-tab system that is the market leader in several jurisdictions with regulated charitable gaming.
